House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to recognize the Cabinet status of the Director of the Office of Management and Budget, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the position of Director of the Office of Management and Budget as a cabinet position at level I of the Executive Schedule. Upgrades the Deputy Director position to level II of the Executive Schedule.

titles.title: A bill to recognize the Cabinet status of the Director of the Office of Management and Budget, and for other purposes.
